column16:
General Principles

While the header mentions "known absent," the text does not address this case.

General remark on quality of the IG. There are still typo's on the webpages: e.g. sibiling, persitence , proper grammar. ...Not enough to vote negative, but this should be fixed before going normative.
Please take care of typo's in document

The CDA version of the international patient summary hasn't had a chance to be implemented and validated. Introducing a different format without any tangible reasons to have a potentially diverging specification will likely lead to implementations of neither specification.
column17: Adding a different and diverging specification format may hinder implementation.
